Posts.EditableText: I am busy learning Quest 5.8, setting up some rooms as well as objects in the rooms.  The problem is when I click on one of the objects in the room (gameplay) nothing happens (I left it default). You can use the compass and places and objects on the right (they work fine).  Please advise on how I can fix the object hyperlinks that do not respond to clicks.
Posts.HTML: I am busy learning Quest 5.8, setting up some rooms as well as objects in the rooms.
